summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 41st Avenue North and 42nd Avenue North, each from East Madison Street to East Lee Street; 43rd Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Garfield Street; East Lee Street and East Galer Street, each from 41st Avenue North to 42nd Avenue North; East Garfield Street, from 41st Avenue North to 43rd Avenue North; East Blaine Street and East Howe Street, each from East Madison Street to 43rd Avenue North; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 72707, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing the payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
